translation.menuDocumentationSecondaryText: New to RivrKitty? Check out our documentation
translation.nftSubtitle: Our aim is to redefine gaming + DeFi by unlocking the true potential of NFTs.
translation.nftBody: A key component of RivrKitty is launching a DeFi-centric and NFT based ecosystem. In the KittyVerse, members can escape reality, own cool unique swag and interact with others in a fun and humourous way and earn $RKitty along the way.
translation.storyBody1: We are just a group of fun-imaginative-rebels working to expand the Moonriver Ecosystem. We believe RivrKitty’s future will be unleashed when we introduce you to the KittyVerse, an innovative DeFi focused platform with a rewarding and self-sustaining in-game economy.
translation.storyBody2: When we launched RivrKitty as a memecoin, the question we asked ourselves however was, could a memecoin be more? In a space where fun meme coins launch alongside truly innovative blockchain projects, we want to thrive beyond building our amazing community and envision making a creative, but fun contribution to the DeFi sector through gamified yield farming.
translation.tokenomicsSubtitle: RivrKitty is a community focused, fair launched token on Moonriver
translation.tokenomicsItem2Subtitle: LP Migrator Contract ensuring your holdings safe
translation.tokenomicsCommunityText: Community focused fair launch. Our mission is to slowly but surely build a project 100% run by its community.
translation.tokenomicsSafeText: Farming smart contract audited by Techcrete to ensure your staked tokens are 100% secure.
translation.tokenomicsVestingText: The project launched with 3% team tokens are locked for 3 months with vesting.
